content: Tej paajlug nuav yog Vaajntxwv Daviv tug tub Xalumoos kws ua vaajntxwv kaav tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees tej paajlug.
Tej nuav yuav paab kuas yug paub has tas lub tswvyim hab tej lug qhuab ntuag zoo le caag, hab yuav paab kuas totaub tej ntsab lug kws tub tub.
Yuav qha yug paub ua neej ntse ntsuav, paub ua tuabneeg sab dlawb sab zoo, paub ua qhov ncaaj nceeg hab ua lawv kev lawv cai.
Yuav paab tau tug kws tsi thoob tsib to nrog txawj ntse tuaj, hab yuav qha cov tub hluas paub ua neej.
Yuav tsaav tswvyim rua cov tuabneeg kws tub txawj ntse lawm, yuav taw kev rua cov tuabneeg kws kawm ntaub kawm ntawv,
kuas puab paub txhais tej paajlug lub ntsab hab totaub tej zaaj kws cov tuabneeg txawj ntse has.
Tug kws fwm tug TSWV, tug ntawd txhaj yog tug kws muaj kev txawj ntse.  Cov tuabneeg ruag nyam thuam lub tswvyim hab tsi kawm txuj kawm ci.
Mivtub, ca le ua tuab zoo noog tej lug kws koj nam hab koj txiv qhuab qha koj.
Nam hab txiv tej lug qha yuav paab kuas koj paub ua lub neej zoo yaam le cev zaam kws ua rua koj zoo nraug.
Mivtub, thaus cov tuabneeg sab phem tuaj yum koj moog ua txhum, koj tsi xob nrug puab moog.
Yog puab has tas, “Ca le nrug peb moog, peb moog tog kev tua tuabneeg! Peb ca le moog nteg tej tuabneeg tsi muaj txim dlaabtsi lug ntaus ua si!
Thaus peb ntsib puab, puab tseem muaj sa nyob cus plawg, tabsis thaus peb moog dlhau lawm, puab yuav tu sav nrho.
Peb yuav moog fuab tau luas tej khoom muaj nqes hab coj tej kws peb fuab tau lug khaws ca puv nkaus rua huv peb tej tsev.
Koj ca le nrug peb moog hab koom nrug peb, peb yuav muab tej kws peb moog fuab tau lug ntawd sis faib.”
Mivtub, koj tsi xob nrug cov tuabneeg zoo le ntawd ua ke. Koj yuavtsum tsiv tawm ntawm puab moog.
Puab cov ntawd tswj tsi tau puab lub sab kuas tsi xob ua txhum. Puab npaaj rawv yuav tua tuabneeg xwb.
Yog cuab tsig rua noog pum yeej tsi maag noog ib zag le,
tabsis cov tuabneeg kws cuab hlua tog luas tej kev, yog puab cuab hlua tog puab xwb, puab yeej yuav tuag rua puab lub vuj hlua.
Kev ua tubsaab los kuj ib yaam le ntawd,  cov tuabneeg kws ua nruj ua tsiv rua luas, yog puab txuv puab txujsa.
Ca le noog! Tswvyim lub suab hu tom tej plawv kev hab tom tej kab tej khw,
hab hu nrov ntxhe ntxhas tom tej roojvaag nroog hab txhua qhov chaw kws muaj tuabneeg tuaj txoos ua ke has tas:
“Cov tuabneeg ruag, mej tseem yuav zoo sab ua tuabneeg ruag le mej moog txug nub twg? Mej yuav thuam kev txawj ntse moog txug thaus twg hab? Mej tsi totaub le los?
Ca le tig qhovntsej noog thaus kuv ntuag mej, kuv yuav qha tej lug zoo rua mej hab yuav faib kuv tej tswvyim rua mej.
Kuv tub hu mej hab caw mej lug noog kuv has lawm, tabsis mej tsi tig qhovntsej noog hab tsi quavntsej kuv tej lug.
Mej tsi khaws kuv tej lug qha ca rua nruab sab, hab tsi kaam ca kuv qhuab ntuag mej.
Yog le ntawd, thaus mej raug kev nyuaj sab ntxhuv plawv kuv yuav luag mej.
Thaus mej txhawj ntshai hab kev txomnyem lug qhwv nkaus mej ib yaam le nthwv cua dlaaj cua dlub ntsawj, ua rua mej raug mob ntsaaj lawg hab raug kev txomnyem, kuv yuav tau zoo luag mej.
Thaus ntawd mej yuav tsaa ncauj hu xaav tau tswvyim, tabsis kuv yuav tsi teb mej. Mej nrhav kuv rua txhua txuj xub ke, tabsis mej yuav nrhav tsi pum kuv nyob qhov twg.
Mej yeej ibtxwm tsi quavntsej tej kev txawj ntse hab mej pheej tsi kaam noog tug TSWV tej lug le.
Mej yeej tsi khaws kuv tej lug qha ca, hab thaus kuv qhuab ntuag mej, mej tsi quavntsej kuv tej lug hlo le.
Vim le nuav mej yuav tau sau lawv le tej kws mej tau ua lug lawm, hab mej teg num yuav ua rua mej dlhuav.
Tej tuabneeg tsi paub qaabhau tuag tub yog vim puab tsi txais yuav lub tswvyim, hab tej tuabneeg ruag puamtsuaj tub yog vim puab tsi quavntsej kev txawj ntse.
Tabsis tug kws noog kuv lug, tug ntawd yuav nyob khov kho hab tso sab plhuav tsi ntshai ib yaam dlaabtsi le.”
Mivtub, koj ca le khaws nkaus kuv tej lug qha rua nruab sab hab cim ntsoov tej kws kuv kuas koj ua.
Yuavtsum ua tuab zoo noog cov tuabneeg txawj ntse tej lug hab muab sab rau noog kuas totaub zoo.
Ca le kub sab lug nrhav kev txawj ntse hab thov, koj txhaj yuav totaub.
Koj ca le muab sab rau nrhav tswvyim ib yaam le nrhav tej qhov nyaj qhov kub kws nyob nraim nkoog.
Yog koj ua le nuav koj yuav paub fwm tug TSWV hab yuav paub tseeb has tas, Vaajtswv yog tug zoo le caag.
Tug TSWV yog tug kws pub tswvyim rua tuabneeg, tej kev txawj kev ntse hab kev totaub puavleej yog nwg pub xwb.
Nwg tiv thaiv hab paab cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg.
Nwg tsomkwm cov tuabneeg kws ua ncaaj rua lwm tug, hab nwg tsomkwm cov tuabneeg kws muab sab npuab nwg.
Yog koj noog kuv lug koj yuav paub qhov tseeb, paub qhov ncaaj nceeg, paub ua lawv le kevcai, hab paub ua koj lub neej.
Koj yuav ua tug tuabneeg muaj tswvyim hab tej kws koj paub ntawd yuav ua rua koj zoo sab.
Tej kws koj totaub hab tej kws koj paub txhij paub txhua yuav tsomkwm koj
hab tiv thaiv kuas koj txhaj tsi yuam kev moog ua txhum. Hab tej ntawd yuav kaav rawv tsi pub koj moog ti cov tuabneeg kws laam tau laam has lug kuas muaj kev kub ntxhuv.
Cov tuabneeg kws tso txujkev ncaaj nceeg tseg maub nuag moog rua txujkev phem.
Puab nyam ua txhum hab txaus sab moog ua tej kev phem kev qas kws tsi muaj qaabhau.
Puab yog cov tuabneeg sab phem sab nkhaus, yeej tsi muaj leejtwg yuav ca sab tau rua puab le.
Koj yuav tau tsiv kuas dlim ntawm tug quaspuj kws has lug mog lug muas ntxag kuas luas tej yuam kev ua txhum,
nwg ua tsi ncaaj rua nwg tug quasyawg hab nwg tsi ncu qaab txug nwg tej lug cog tseg rua Vaajtswv lawm.
Yog koj moog rua huv nwg tsev, ces yog koj taug kev moog rua txujkev tuag ntaag. Qhov kws koj moog rua huv nwg tsev tub yog moog rua huv tubtuag teb lawm.
Tug kws moog rua huv tug quaspuj ntawd tsev, yeej tsi tau rov qaab lug le lawm. Nwg yuav tsi tau rov qaab lug taug txujkev kws muaj txujsa ib zag le.
Yog le ntawd koj yuavtsum xyum ua koj lub neej lawv le tug txivneej kws ua zoo hab ua lub neej ncaaj nceeg.
Cov tuabneeg kws ncaaj nceeg hab ua zoo, yuav tau nyob huv lub tebchaws.
Tabsis Vaajtswv yuav muab tej tuabneeg sab phem tshem tawm huv lub tebchaws ntawd moog hab muab tej tuabneeg txhum rhu tawm ib yaam le dlob nroj povtseg ntaag.
Mivtub, koj tsi xob muab kuv tej lug qhuab qha tso tseg. Ncu ntsoov tej lug kws kuv qha rua koj lawm.
Kuv tej lug qhuab qha yuav ntxiv noobnyoog rua koj, kuas koj muaj sa nyob ntev hab tau kev kaaj sab lug.
Tsi xob muab txujkev ua zoo hab kev ncaaj nceeg tso tseg. Muab tej ntawd lug coj ntawm koj cejdlaab. Muab tej ntawd sau rua huv koj lub sab.
Yog koj ua le nuav, Vaajtswv hab tuabneeg yuav txaus sab rua koj.
Ca sab rua tug TSWV kuas kawg koj lub sab lub ntsws. Tsi xob ca sab rua koj tej kev txawj ntse.
Txhua yaam kws koj ua koj yuavtsum ncu ntsoov tug TSWV, nwg txhaj yuav coj koj taug txujkev kws tseeb.
Tsi xob xaav has tas koj yog tug ntse tshaaj. Ca le fwm tug TSWV hab tsi xob moog ua kev txhum.
Yog koj ua le nuav, tej ntawd yuav zoo ib yaam le hauv tshuaj kuab muaj tsuas kws khu tau koj tej qhov txhaab hab ua rua koj tej mob zoo zuj zug.
Koj yuavtsum fwm tug TSWV hab muab tej qoobloo zoo kawg nkaus kws koj khwv tau huv koj dlaim teb coj moog fij rua nwg.
Yog koj ua le ntawd, koj yuav muaj qoobloo puv txhaab, hab koj yuav muaj cawv txiv maab ntau heev tsi muaj hub ntim taag.
Mivtub, thaus tug TSWV qhuab ntuag koj, ua tuab zoo noog, hab khaws nkaus nwg tej lug rua nruab sab, kuas koj txhaj paub ceevfaaj.
Tug TSWV qhuab ntuag tug kws nwg hlub, ib yaam le leej txiv qhuab ntuag tug tub kws nwg ca sab rua.
Tug kws muaj tswvyim hab totaub txhua tsaav yaam yeej nyob kaaj sab lug.
Lub tswvyim tseemceeb dlua nyaj, nwg muaj nqes rua koj tshaaj tej kub.
Tswvyim muaj nqes tshaaj tej saw kub; tej kws koj ntshaw tsi muaj ib yaam dlaabtsi yuav pev tau lub tswvyim ntawd le.
Lub tswvyim paab tau rua koj muaj sa nyob ntev, ua rua koj muaj txag npluanuj hab muaj koob muaj meej.
Lub tswvyim muaj peevxwm paab tau koj ua lub neej txaus sab hab coj koj ua neej tshaav ntuj nrig.
Cov tuabneeg kws muaj tswvyim yeej ua neej nyob kaaj sab lug. Lub tswvyim yuav ua rua puab muaj sa nyob cus plawg.
Tug TSWV lub tswvyim tsim lub nplajteb nuav; nwg txujkev txawj ntse muab lub ntuj teeb nyob muaj chaw.
Nwg lub tswvyim ua rua tej dlej txawj ndlwg tawm lug, hab tej fuab txhaj ua tau naag lug rua huv nplajteb nuav.
Mivtub, tuav rawv koj lub tswvyim hab kev txawj ntse ca. Tsi xob ca tej ntawd tsiv tawm ntawm koj moog.
Tej tswvyim ntawd yuav ua rua koj muaj sa nyob, txaus sab hab ua neej nyob kaaj sab lug.
Koj yuav taug kev kaaj sab lug hab tsi raug teebmeem ib zag le.
Thaus koj moog pw los koj yuav tsi ntshai, hab koj yuav tau zoo pw tsaug zug ib mos kaaj ntug.
Koj yuav tsi txhawj txug tej kev puamtsuaj kws lug ntawm tej tuabneeg sab phem, ib yaam le cua dlaaj cua dlub ntsawj kws koj nwm tsi txug.
Tug TSWV yuav pub koj tau zoo nyob kaaj sab lug. Nwg yuav tsi ca koj moog maag lub vuj hlua.
Yog muaj tej yaam kws koj paab tau lwm tug, ca le paab tsi xob muab khaws ca.
Yog koj muaj txawm peem kws yuav paab tau tej phoojywg zej zog, ca le paab tsi xob kuas nwg tog txug pigkig tsaiv.
Tsi xob ua ib yaam dlaabtsi rua tej phoojywg zej zog kws nyob ntawm koj tog tsev tu sab, nwg yeej ca sab ntsoov rua koj xwb.
Tsi xob nrug leejtwg sis caav tej yaam kws tsi muaj qaabhau, yog nwg tsi tau ua ib qhov phem rua koj.
Tsi xob khib rua tej tuabneeg kws ua phem lossis tsi xob xyum ua le puab ua,
rua qhov tug TSWV ntxub tej tuabneeg kws ua phem ua qas, tabsis nwg txaus sab rua cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg.
Tug TSWV foom phem rua tsev tuabneeg kws ua limham, tabsis nwg foom koob moov rua tsev tuabneeg kws ua ncaaj nceeg.
Nwg luag cov tuabneeg khaavtheeb plig, tabsis nwg hlub cov kws txu fwjchim.
Cov tuabneeg txawj ntse yuav tau koob meej zoo, tabsis cov tuabneeg ruag yuav poob ntsejmuag.
Mivtub, ca le noog koj txiv tej lug qhuab qha. Ua tuab zoo noog, koj txhaj le yuav totaub.
Tej lug kws kuv qhuab qha koj yeej yog tej lug zoo xwb, yog le ntawd, koj yuavtsum ncu ntsoov txhua lu huv tuabsi.
Thaus kuv tseem yog mivnyuas tub kws yog kuv nam hab kuv txiv tuab tug tub,

mas kuv txiv tub yeej qhuab qha kuv lawm. Nwg has tas, “Ncu ntsoov tej lug kws kuv qha koj nuav rua nruab sab hab tsi xob muab tso tseg ib zag le. Ua ib yaam le kuv qha koj lawm, koj txhaj yuav muaj sa ua neej nyob.
Ca le txais yuav lub tswvyim hab kev txawj ntse! Tsi xob tso kuv tej lug tseg.
Tsi xob muab lub tswvyim tso povtseg, rua qhov nwg yuav tsomkwm koj; saib lub tswvyim kuas muaj nqes, nwg txhaj yuav paab kuas koj tau kev kaaj sab lug.
Qhov tseemceeb tshaaj plawg yog lub tswvyim. Koj yuav ua yaam dlaabtsi los xij, koj yuavtsum xub nrhav kuas tau lub tswvyim.
Saib lub tswvyim kuas muaj nqes, nwg yuav ua rua koj tau koob meej. Ca le puag nkaus  lub tswvyim ca, nwg txhaj yuav ua rua koj tau ntsejmuag.
Tswvyim yuav yog lub mom kub rua koj ntoo nto moo lug.”
Mivtub, noog kuv tej lug. Khaws nkaus tej lug kws kuv qha koj nuav ca, koj txhaj muaj txujsa ua neej nyob ntev.
Kuv tau qha tswvyim rua koj hab coj koj ua neej rua txujkev ncaaj nceeg.
Yog koj ua neej lawv le txujkev txawj ntse, yuav tsi muaj ib yaam dlaabtsi thaiv koj kev, hab tsi muaj ib yaam dlaabtsi dlawm koj kutaw thaus koj dlha.
Ncu ntsoov txhua yaam kws koj tau kawm lug lawm tsi xob muab tso tseg. Koj tej kev kawm txawj kawm ntse yog koj txujsa ntaag, ca le ceev nwg kuas zoo.
Tsi xob moog rua tej qhov chaw kws cov tuabneeg ua phem moog. Tsi xob xyum ua lawv le cov tuabneeg sab phem tug yaam ntxwv.
Tsi xob ua phem ua qas hlo le! Ca le tsiv kuas dlhau txujkev phem qas ntawd! Tsi xob moog ua txujkev phem, saib ntsoov rua koj txuj hauv kev xwb.
Tej tuabneeg sab phem yog tsi tau ua kev txhum, mas puab pw tsi tsaug zug. Yog puab tsi tau ua rua ib tug twg raug mob mas puab tsi pw le.
Kev ua phem hab kev yuam cai zoo ib yaam le yog puab tej zaub mov hab dlej haus ntaag.
Txujkev kws cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg taug mas zoo ib yaam le thaus lub nub taabtom tawm tuaj, pum kev txoog hab ci zuj zug moog txug rua thaus taav su.
Cov tuabneeg sab phem taug txujkev tsaus ntuj nti, ib yaam le mo ntuj. Puab qaug tabsis tsi pum yaam kws puab dlawm le.
Mivtub, koj yuavtsum muab sab npuab tej lug kws kuv has. Ua tuab zoo noog kuv tej lug.
Tsi xob ca kuv tej lug tawm ntawm koj moog. Ncu ntsoov kuv tej lug hab khaws nkaus ca rua nruab sab.
Tej lug ntawd yuav pub txujsa hab kev noj qaab nyob zoo rua txhua tug kws totaub tej lug ntawd.
Koj yuavtsum ceevfaaj hab xaav zoo zoo; rua qhov koj lub neej moog lawv le koj tej kev xaav.
Tsi xob has tej lug tsi tseeb. Tsi xob has lug dlaag hab tsi xob has tej lug kws tsi zoo.
Tsaa qhovmuag saib ncaaj nraim rua tom hauv ntej; hab saib ntsoov koj txuj hauv kev.
Ua tuab zoo xaav ua ntej kws koj yuav ua ib yaam dlaabtsi, mas koj txhaj ua tau qhov zoo.
Ca le tsiv tawm ntawm txujkev phem hab taug kev ncaaj nraim rua tom hauv ntej. Tsi xob moog rua saab xis lossis saab txhumphem.
Mivtub, ua tuab zoo noog kuv lub tswvyim hab kuv tej kev txawj ntse.
Koj txhaj yuav paub coj koj tug cwjpwm zoo, hab tej lug kws koj has yuav qha has tas, koj yog tug kws txawj ntse.
Luas tej quaspuj lub qhovncauj has lug mog lug muas qaab zib ib yaam le zib ntaab hab nwg nwj nplua le pleev roj txiv ntoo,
tabsis tom qaab ntawd nwg tsi muab dlaabtsi rua koj le, tsuas yog muab kev ab kev dlaw hab kev mob kev nkeeg rua koj xwb.
Txujkev kws nwg taug yog txujkev tuag. Nwg yuav coj koj moog rua huv tubtuag teb.
Nwg tsi taug txujkev kws muaj txujsa; tabsis nwg laam ua neej xwb, nwg tub tsi paub has tas yuav muaj xwm dlaabtsi tshwm lug rua nwg le.
Mivtub, nwgnuav koj ca le noog kuv has, hab tsi xob muab kuv tej lug ib lus tso povtseg le.
Ca le tsiv tawm ntawm tej quaspuj kws has taag lug nuav! Tsi xob moog ze ntawm nwg lub qhovrooj hlo le!
Yog koj ua tsi zoo, lwm tug yuav tau txais koj lub koob meej, hab koj yuav tuag thaus koj tseem hluas rua tej tuabneeg kws tsi muaj kev taabncuab txhais teg,
hab luas tej yuav tuaj txeeb koj tej qhov txhua chaw, hab tej kws koj khwv tau lug yuav poob moog ua luas tug.
Koj yuav pw quaj dlaa luam sau lub txaaj kws yog txujkev tuag, kaas yuav muab koj cev nqaj noj taag,
ces koj yuav has tas, “Vim le caag kuv yuav tsi noog luas tej lug qhuab qha? Vim le caag kuv tsi ca luas qhuab ntuag kuv?
Kuv tsi noog tej lug kws kuv tug xwbfwb qha. Kuv tsi quavntsej tej lug qha ntawd le.
Hab tuab plag ntshis kuv ca le raug  kev txaajmuag taabmeeg tej tuabneeg suavdlawg.”
Koj yuavtsum ncaaj nceeg rua koj tug quaspuj hab hlub nwg tuab leeg xwb.
Tej mivnyuas kws koj moog thaam lwm tug quaspuj muaj yuav tsi zoo rua koj.
Tsimnyog ca koj tej mivnyuas ntawd luj hlub lug paab koj, tsi yog tso rua luas qhua.
Koj ca le txaus sab rua koj tug quaspuj hab nrhav kev zoo sab nrug tug hluas nkauj kws koj yuav thaus koj tseem hluas,
nwg zoo nkauj hab ntxim hlub ib yaam le tug xyuas muaslwj. Ca nwg lub xubndlag ua chaw suv sab rua koj, ca nwg txujkev hlub nyob puagncig koj.
Mivtub, vim le caag koj moog hlub dlua lwm tug quaspuj lawm? Vim le caag koj moog nyam lwm tug quaspuj lub xubndlag?
Tug TSWV pum txhua yaam kws koj ua. Koj moog qhov twg los nwg yeej saib ntsoov koj.
Cov tuabneeg sab phem tej kev txhum yog lub vuj hlua ntaag. Nwg txujkev txhum ua lub vaag rov khwb nwg.
Nwg tuag rua qhov nwg tswj tsi tau nwg lub sab. Nwg txujkev ruag yuav xaa nwg moog rua huv nwg lub qhov ntxaa.
Mivtub, koj puas tau coglug rua leejtwg kws yuav paab them nwg tej nuj nqes?
Koj tej lug puas rov khi koj hab koj tej lug cog tseg puas rov ua lub vuj hlua cuab koj kev?
Mivtub, yog koj tau coglug le ntawd, ces koj poob rua tug tuabneeg ntawd qaab fwjchim lawm, koj ca le moog cuag nwg, hab thov thim koj tej lug cog tseg, kuas nwg tso koj, koj txhaj yuav dlim.
Koj tsi xob pw tsaug zug lossis nyob ncaws nruj nris.
Ca le tsiv tawm ntawm lub vuj hlua ib yaam le tug noog lossis tug muaslwj tsiv ntawm tug tuabneeg yos tua tsaj.
Tug tuabneeg tubnkeeg, ca le moog saib ntsaum, saib ntsaum ua ntsaum lub neej le caag, koj txhaj le muaj tswvyim.
Tej ntsaum tub tsi muaj thawjcoj, tsi muaj numtswv lossis tsi muaj ib tug thawjtswj kaav le,
tabsis lub caij ntuj su puab txawj moog nrhav zaub mov lug npaaj ca noj rua lub caij ntuj no.
Tug tuabneeg tubnkeeg, koj tseem yuav pw ntev le caag? Thaus twg koj maam le sawv?
Tug tuabneeg tubnkeeg has tas, “Kuv tseem yuav tsaug ib tsig zug, hab kuv yuav khawm teg su ib chim tsaiv.”
Tabsis thaus nwg tseem pw tsaug zug, kev txomnyem yuav lug raug nwg ib yaam le tug tubsaab kws nqaa rawv qws tuaj fuab nwg lub neej ntaag.
Cov tuabneeg tsi tsimtxaj hab sab phem tawm moog has lug dlaag rua nuav rua u.
Puab txav muag hab ua tug pleeg tsawv ntxag koj nkaus xwb,
txhua yaam kws puab xaav huv puab lub sab puavleej yog tej kev phem kev qas, hab ua kuas muaj teebmeem rua txhua qhov chaw.
Vim le nuav, txujkev puamtsuaj txhaj yuav lug raug puab thaus puab tsi ncu ceevfaaj, hab puab tej nqaj yuav ndluag ua qhov txhaab khu tsi tau.

Muaj xyaa yaam kws tug TSWV ntxub kawg nkaus hab zaam txim tsi tau rua le, yog le nuav: Ua qhovmuag qauj leg, tug nplaig kws has lug dlaag, ob txhais teg kws tua tej tuabneeg tsi muaj txhum, lub sab kws ntaus tswvyim ua phem, ob txhais kutaw kws maaj nrooj moog ua kev phem, ua timkhawv tsi tseeb ib tug dlhau rua ib tug, hab tug tuabneeg nkawg xaiv kuas tej phoojywg muaj teebmeem.
Mivtub, ca le ua lawv le koj txiv qha koj hab tsi xob tso koj nam tej lug qha tseg.
Khaws nkaus obtug tej lug moog ua koj lub neej, hab khaws nkaus tej lug ntawd rua huv koj lub sab.
Obtug tej lug qhuab qha yuav coj koj txuj hauv kev thaus koj taabtom taug kev, yuav tsomkwm koj thaus tsaus ntuj, hab thaus nruab nub tej lug ntawd yuav ntuag koj.
Obtug tej lug qhuab ntuag yuav ua lub teeb ci ntsaa ab rua koj pum kev; obtug tej lug qhuab qha yuav paab tau koj kev ua neej.
Tej lug ntawd fwjxwm tsi pub koj txaav moog ti tej quaspuj sab phem, hab ntawm luas tej quaspuj tej lug haub ntxag.
Tsi xob ca puab tej kev zoo nkauj sim koj sab; tsi xob ca puab tej qhovmuag ua lub vuj hlua soo tau koj.
Ib tug txivneej muab ib lub ncuav ndlav tau ib tug namndlav, tabsis kev ntxag luas quaspuj yuav ua rua nwg puag npe moog taag simneej.
Koj puas tso tau suavtawg rua ntawm koj hauvsab kuas tsi xob kub koj tej rig tsho?
Koj puas moog tau sau cov ncaig tawg kws cig ntsaa thuav kuas tsi xob kub koj ob txhais kutaw?
Tug kws moog nrug luas quaspuj pw, yuav tsi dlim ib yaam le ntawd ntaag. Yog leejtwg ua, nwg yuav raug kev tsimtxom.
Tuabneeg tsi ntxub tug tubsaab, yog has tas nwg nyag zaub mov noj thaus nwg tshaib plaab;
yog luas nteg tau nwg, nwg yuavtsum them xyaa npaug rov qaab, nwg yuav tau muab taagnrho tej kws nwg muaj moog them.
Tabsis tug txivneej kws ua txhum kev nkauj kev nraug, yog tug tuabneeg kws tsi txawj xaav; nwg rov ua rua nwg raug kev puamtsuaj ntaag.
Nwg yuav raug txaajmuag hab raug ntaus; hab nwg yuav raug txobthuam moog taag simneej.
Tsi muaj ib yaam kws ua rua tug quasyawg chim hab khib npaum le thaus kws luas tuaj txeeb nwg tug; mas thaus nwg ua pauj, nwg yuav pauj kuas txaus nkaus.
Tug quasyawg yuav tsi kaam txais yuav tej nyaj kws nplua ntawd le; txawm yog yuav muab nyaj ntau npaum le caag los yeej dlaws tsi tau nwg txujkev chim le.
Mivtub, koj ncu ntsoov kuv tej lug, hab khaws kuv tej lug ca rua nruab sab.
Ua koj lub neej le kuv qha, koj txhaj yuav muaj sa ua neej nyob. Koj yuavtsum ua tuab zoo khaws kuv tej lug qha, ib yaam le koj txuag koj ob lub qhovmuag.
Ncu ntsoov kuv tej lug qha txhua lub sijhawm; muab khaws nkaus rua nruab sab.
Suav has tas, lub tswvyim yog koj tug muam, hab kev txawj ntse yog koj tug phoojywg zoo.
Tej lug ntawd yuav tswj tsi pub kuas koj moog ti luas tej quaspuj, hab tej quaspuj kws has lug mog lug muas.
Muaj ib zag kuv tuaj huv kuv lub tsev saib ntawm qhovrais moog,
kuv pum muaj ib paab tub hluas kws tsi tau paub qaabhau taug kev tuaj, tabsis muaj ib tug yog tug ruag tshaaj cov.
Ces nwg txawm taug kev moog ze rua ntawm kev tshuam kws tug quaspuj ntawd nyob. Hab nwg moog ze rua ntawm tug quaspuj ntawd lub tsev,
thaus nub poob qho kws tub tsaus ntuj zuag lawm.
Ces tug quaspuj txawm tawm tuaj cuag tug hluas ntawd; tug quaspuj ntawd naav tsoog zoo nkaus le tug namndlav hab npaaj tej tswvyim dlaag ntxag.
Nwg ua tug muaj plhus ntxhas tsi paub txaajmuag rua tej tuabneeg kws dlua kev le,
lossis moog sawv ntawm tej kev tshuam tog, muaj qee zag nwg moog sawv pav yeev huv tej plawv kev, muaj qee zag nwg moog sawv pav yeev huv tej kab tej khw.
Nwg xyaab hlo npaab moog puag nkaus tug tub hluas ntawd nwj kag, saib ntsoov tug tub hluas tsi ntsais muag le hab has tas,
“Nub nua kuv tua tsaj fij hab muaj tej nqaj theej txhoj ntawd ntau heev.
Yog le ntawd, kuv txhaj tawm tuaj nrhav koj. Mas kuv xaav ntsib koj kawg le, muaj moo kuv txhaj ntsib koj ntawm nuav!
Kuv tub muab tej ntaub maag txaij nraug zeeg kws coj nraag tebchaws Iziv tuaj lug pua kuv lub txaaj lawm.
Kuv tub muab tshuaj tsw qaab alu-es hab kinamoos lug pleev kuv lub txaaj tsw qaab ntxag lawm.
Ca le nrug kuv moog! Wb yuav sis puag pw zoo sab ib mos kaaj ntug. Wb ib leeg yuav txaus sab rua ib leeg txhais npaab.
Kuv tug quasyawg tsi nyob huv tsev. Nwg moog kev dleb lawm.
Nwg nqaa hlo lub naab nyaj nrug nwg moog lawm, hab nwg yuav moog ntev txug ob lub limtam maam le rov qaab lug.”
Tug quaspuj ntawd has tej lug mog lug muas haub ntxag, ces tug tub hluas txhaj qaug sab hlo rua tug quaspuj ntawd tej lug ntxag.
Taamsim ntawd nwg ca le nrug tug quaspuj moog ib yaam nkaus le luas caab tug txiv nyuj moog khi ntawm tswg tua, hab ib yaam le luas puav muaslwj dlha moog maag vuj hlua.

Yog qhov chaw kws xibxub vug yuav chob moog ti nkaus rua huv nwg lub plawv. Nwg zoo ib yaam le tug noog kws yaa moog maag luas lub vaag. Nwg tsi paub has tas, nwg txujsa tub poob moog rua txujkev puamtsuaj lawm.
Cov Mivtub, nwgnuav mej ca le noog kuv has. Hab khaws kuv tej lug ca.
Tsi xob pub tej quaspuj kws zoo le tug quaspuj nuav ntxag tau mej lub sab; tsi xob ua tug tuabneeg kws tsi paub qaabhau dlaabtsi hab tsi xob lawv nwg qaab moog.
Nwg tub ua rua ntau tug txivneej raug puamtsuaj hab ua rua coob leej tuag lawm suav tsi txheeb.
Yog koj moog rua huv nwg tsev, ces yog koj taabtom taug kev moog rua huv tubtuag teb lawm ntaag. Qhov ntawd yog txujkev kws tuag sai kawg nkaus le.
Ca le noog! Lub tswvyim taabtom hu. Txujkev totaub tsaa nwg lub suab hu.
Lub tswvyim yeej sawv nreg nroog sau tej ncov roob kws nyob ze rua ntawm tej ntug kev hab ntawm tej kev tshuam.
Lub tswvyim tuaj ntawm tej ncauj ke kws nkaag moog rua huv nroog, hab sawv ntawm tej roojvaag ib saab hu has tas:
“Tuabneeg, kuv tub hu mej lawm; kuv hu txhua tug kws nyob huv nplajteb nuav huv tuabsi.
Mej tseem yog mivnyuas mog xwb los? Ca le kawm ua le tej laug ua. Mej yog tuabneeg ruag los? Ca le kawm kuas ntse los mas.
Ua tuab zoo noog kuv tej lug kws zoo tshaaj plawg nuav; txhua yaam kws kuv qha mej yeej yog yaam tseeb xwb.
Yaam kws kuv has yog qhov tseeb; kuv ntxub tej lug dlaag kawg le.
Txhua yaam kws kuv has puavleej yog lug tseeb; tsi muaj ib lus twg yog lug dlaag lossis yuam kev le.
Tug tuabneeg kws txawj ntse, nwg totaub tej lug nuav zoo; hab txhua yaam yoojyim rua tug kws txawj ntse.
Khaws kuv tej lug qhuab ntuag ca zoo dlua le khaws tej nyaj txag; khaws tej kev txawj ntse ca zoo dlua le khaws tej tseem kub.
“Kuv yog lub tswvyim, kuv zoo dlua tej hlaws muaj nqes; txhua yaam kws mej xaav yuav yeej pev tsi tau kuv le.
Kuv yog lub tswvyim, hab kuv muaj kev txawj ntse heev; kuv muaj kev txawj ntse hab paub txav txim.
Qhov kws fwm tug TSWV, yog ntxub txujkev phem kev qas; kuv ntxub txujkev khaavtheeb, txujkev limham txujkev phem qas hab tej lug dlaag kawg le.
Kuv tub npaaj tau tswvyim hab yuav siv tej tswvyim ntawd tawm ntaag. Kuv yog tug thoob tsib to nrog, hab kuv yog tug muaj zug nchaav.
Kuv paab tej vaajntxwv tswj teb kaav chaw hab tej numtswv rhawv kevcai tswjfwm ncaaj nceeg.
Txhua tug numtswv kws kaav huv lub nplajteb, kuv yog tug kws paab puab, tej coj plaub tsaws ntug hab tej numtswv qeb sab los ib yaam nkaus.
Kuv hlub cov kws hlub kuv; yog leejtwg nrhav kuv yeej yuav ntsib kuv.
Nyaj txag hab meejmom, kev npluanuj hab kev vaammeej kuv puavleej muaj.
Tej kws koj tau ntawm kuv lug zoo dlua tej tseem kub hab zoo dlua tej tseem nyaj.
Kuv taug kev ncaaj nceeg; kuv ua lawv le txujkev tseeb,
kuv muab kuv tej nyaj txag rua tug kws hlub kuv, puab tej tsev tuabneeg muaj nyaj muaj txaj nplua mag.
“Tug TSWV xub tsim kuv ua ntej dlua ib puas tsaav yaam huv tuabsi, kuv yog teg num kws nwg xub ua thaus u lug lawm.
Nwg yeej tsim kuv thaus chivkeeb, kuv yeej nyob thaus tsi tau tsim lub nplajteb nuav lug lawm.
Kuv tseem xub muaj nyob dlua thaus tseem tsi tau muaj havtxwv hab tej dlej txhawv.
Kuv tseem xub yug dlua tej hauv roob, ua ntej tej ncov roob nyob muaj chaw,
ua ntej Vaajtswv tsim lub nplajteb hab tej taj nraag lossis thawj phoov teg aav.
Thaus Vaajtswv muab lub ntuj moog tso nyob muaj chaw, kuv tub yeej nyob ntawd lawm, thaus nwg nthuav lub ntuj kuas tug npoo ntuj moog hlaa dlej havtxwv,
thaus nwg muab tej fuab moog tso rua sau nruab ntug, thaus nwg qheb tej qhovdlej havtxwv,
hab has kuas tej havtxwv tsuas ndlwg txij tej nrim kws nwg kom tseg. Thaus nwg puab tej caag nplajteb kuv tub yeej nyob ntawd lawm.
Kuv yeej nyob rawv ntawm nwg ib saab ib yaam le tug kws tsaa tsev ntaag, kuv yog tug kws naj nub ua rua nwg zoo sab, hab nrug nwg nyob suv sab so,
kuv zoo sab rua lub nplajteb hab txaus sab rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg.
“Cov tub hluas, nwgnuav mej ca le noog kuv has! Ua le kuv has, mej txhaj yuav tau zoo nyob kaaj sab lug.
Ca le noog tej lug kws kuv qha mej nuav. Tsi xob muab tso tseg; mej txhaj yuav txawj ntse.
Tug tuabneeg kws noog kuv tej lug, tug tuabneeg kws naj nub tuaj sawv ntawm kuv lub qhovrooj tog yuav lug huv kuv lub tsev, yuav tau nyob kaaj sab lug.
Tug tuabneeg kws nrhav kuv yog nwg nrhav txujsa ntaag, hab tug TSWV yuav txaus sab rua nwg.
Tug tuabneeg kws tsi lug nrhav kuv, tug ntawd rov txuv nwg txujsa. Leejtwg ntxub kuv ces yog nwg nyam txujkev tuag.”
Lub tswvyim ua nwg lub tsev, hab txhus xyaa tug ncej txheem lub tsev ntawd.
Nwg muab ib tug tsaj tua ua pluag noj pluag haus, muab cawv xyaw rua, hab coj moog txawb rua sau rooj.
Nwg tso nwg cov ntxhais qhev moog rua sau qhov chaw sab huv lub nroog hu tuaj has tas:
“Cov tuabneeg ruag, mej ca le lug ntawm nuav!” Hab nwg has rua cov txivneej ruag has tas,
“Ca le tuaj, tuaj noj kuv tej zaub mov hab haus tej cawv kws kuv tov tau lawm.
Ca le tso plhuav txujkev ruag tseg, hab lawv txujkev txawj ntse qaab, koj txhaj le yuav muaj sa nyob.”
Yog koj ntuag tug tuabneeg kws luag lwm tug plig, mas koj yuav raug thuam. Yog koj thuam tej tuabneeg ua phem, mas koj yuav raug lug tsi zoo.
Tsi xob moog ntuag tug tuabneeg kws luag lwm tug plig hlo le, nyob tsaam nwg yuav ntxub koj. Tabsis yog koj ntuag tug tuabneeg txawj ntse, mas nwg yuav fwm koj.
Txhua yaam kws koj has rua tug tuabneeg txawj ntse yuav ua rua nwg muaj tswvyim ntxiv. Tej kws koj qha rua tug tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg yuav ntxiv kuas nwg muaj kev txawj ntse.
Tug kws muaj tswvyim, yog tug kws paub fwm tug TSWV. Yog koj paub Vaajtswv tug kws Dlawbhuv, koj txhaj yog tug totaub tag.
Lub tswvyim yuav ntxiv kuas koj muaj sa ua neej nyob ntau xyoo.
Yog koj muaj tswvyim, koj yuav muaj koob muaj meej, tabsis yog koj muab lub tswvyim povtseg, koj yuav raug kev txomnyem.
Kev ruag zoo le tug quaspuj kws suab nrov, tawv ncauj hab tsi paub txaajmuag le.
Nwg nyob rawv ntawm nwg lub qhovrooj lossis sau lub chaw kws sab tshaaj plawg huv nroog,
hab hu tej tuabneeg kws dlua kev tuaj moog ua puab tej num has tas:
“Cov tuabneeg tawv ncauj, ca le lug ntawm nuav!” Nwg has rua tug txivneej ruag has tas,
“Cov dlej kws nyag lug yeej qaab zib dlua. Tej ncuav kws nyag lug yeej qaab tshaaj.”

Puab tsi paub has tas, cov tuabneeg kws tuag lawm, tub yog cov kws moog huv tug quaspuj ntawd tsev. Cov tuabneeg kws moog rua huv nwg tsev lawm, yog cov kws nyob huv tubtuag teb qhov kws tub tshaaj plawg.
Tej nuav yog Xalumoos tej paajlug: Tug tub kws muaj tswvyim ua rua leej txiv zoo sab heev rua nwg; tug tub kws ruag coj kev ntxhuv sab lug rua nwg nam.
Tej nyaj txag kws koj tau lug ntawm kev tsi ncaaj nceeg, yuav tsi ua rua koj npluanuj, tabsis tej kws tau lug ntawm kev ncaaj nceeg yuav cawm tau koj txujsa.
Tug TSWV yuav tsi ca tej tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg tshaib nqhes, tabsis nwg yuav tsi pub cov tuabneeg sab phem tau tej kws puab ntshaw.
Kev tubnkeeg yuav ua rua koj pluag, tabsis kev nquag yuav ua rua koj npluanuj.
Tug kws muaj tswvyim, nwg mob sab sau qoobloo rua thaus tej qoob sav, tabsis tug kws pw thaus lub caij sau qoob yuav raug kev txaajmuag.
Tug tuabneeg kws sab zoo yuav tau txais koob moov. Tabsis tug tuabneeg sab phem has tej lug tsi zoo.
Luas yuav ncu ntsoov tej tuabneeg sab zoo lub koob moog le, tabsis tug tuabneeg sab phem yuav tsi muaj leejtwg ncu txug.
Tug tuabneeg muaj tswvyim khaws luas tej lug qhuab ntuag, tabsis tug tuabneeg ntau ncauj yuav raug puamtsuaj.
Tug tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg tau zoo nyob kaaj sab lug, tabsis tug tuabneeg tsi ncaaj nceeg yuav raug luas nteg.
Tug kws zais sab mas ua kuas muaj kev kub ntxhuv, tabsis tug kws ntuag luas taabmeeg, yuav ua kuas muaj kev sis humxeeb.
Tug tuabneeg sab zoo tej lug yog lub qhovdlej kws cawm tau txujsa, tabsis tug tuabneeg sab phem tog rawv ntxo luas xwb.
Kev ntxub ua kuas muaj teebmeem, tabsis kev hlub ua rua kev cibnyeej pluj moog.
Tej tuabneeg txawj ntse has tej lug kws totaub, tabsis tej tuabneeg ruag yuav raug luas nplawm.
Tug tuabneeg muaj tswvyim khaws tej kev txawj ntse ca, tabsis thaus cov tuabneeg ruag has lug, ua rua muaj kev kub ntxhuv.
Nyaj txag tsomkwm cov tuabneeg npluanuj; cov pluag raug kev tsimtxom hab puamtsuaj.
Nqe zug rua tug kws ua zoo yog txujsa, tabsis tej kws tug ua phem tau, yog kev puamtsuaj.
Tug tuabneeg kws ua tuab zoo noog thaus luas qhuab ntuag yuav tau txujsa, tabsis cov tuabneeg kws tsi leeg yuav luas tej lug ntuag yuav raug kev puamtsuaj.
Tug tuabneeg kws zais nwg tej kev ntxub rua nruab sab yog ib tug tuabneeg dlaag. Leejtwg ua tuabneeg ntau ncauj tug ntawd yog ib tug tuabneeg ruag.
Yog koj ua tuabneeg ntau ncauj, yuav ua rua koj has lug txhum ntau ntxiv. Yog koj ntse, koj tsi xob ua tuabneeg ntau ncauj.
Tug tuabneeg sab zoo tej lug muaj nqes le tej tseem nyaj; tug tuabneeg sab phem tej kev xaav tsi muaj qaabhau dlaabtsi.
Tug tuabneeg sab zoo tej lug paab tau coob leej, tabsis tug tuabneeg ruag tuag vim nwg tsi txawj xaav.
Tub yog tug TSWV foom koob moov rua koj, koj txhaj muaj txag npluanuj. Tsi yog qhov kws koj naj nub khwv ua rua koj npluanuj.
Tug kws zoo sab ua txhum yeej yog tuabneeg ruag. Tug tuabneeg txawj ntse txaus sab rua nwg tej tswvyim.
Cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg tau tej kws puab xaav yuav, tabsis tej tuabneeg ua phem tej kev ntshai yuav lug raug puab.
Cua dlaaj cua dlub ntsawj cov tuabneeg kws ua phem moog povtseg, tabsis cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg yuav tau zoo nyob kaaj sab lug.
Tsi xob khaiv tug tuabneeg tubnkeeg moog ua ib yaam dlaabtsi rua koj. Nwg yuav zoo le cov kua qaub rua koj cov kaugnav lossis tej paa tawg kws ntshawb koj qhovmuag.
Ua lub neej fwm tug TSWV, koj txhaj yuav muaj txujsa ua neej nyob ntev. Cov tuabneeg sab phem tuag ua ntej puab lub caij nyoog.
Tej tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg txujkev ca sab coj puab moog rua qhov tau zoo, tabsis cov tuabneeg ua phem, ua neej tsaus ntuj nti tsi pum yaav tom ntej.
Tug TSWV tsomkwm tej tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg, tabsis nwg rhuav tshem tej tuabneeg kws ua txhum.
Cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg yuav tau nyob huv lub tebchaws, tabsis cov tuabneeg ua phem yuav raug muab ntab tawm.
Cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg xaiv tej lug zoo has, tabsis luas yuav txwv tug nplaig kws has lug phem.
Cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg paub has tej lug kws txaus suavdlawg yuav, tabsis cov tuabneeg sab phem has tej lug kws chob luas sab xwb.
Tug TSWV ntxub cov tuabneeg kws muab raab teev ntxo lug luj rua luas, nwg txaus sab rua cov tuabneeg kws muab raab teev tsi ntxo lug luj rua luas.
Tug tuabneeg khaavtheeb yuav poob ntsejmuag. Tabsis tug tuabneeg txawj ntse paub txu fwjchim.
Txujkev ncaaj nceeg yuav coj tug tuabneeg ua zoo kev. Cov tuabneeg kws tsi ncaaj nceeg yuav raug kev puamtsuaj.
Kev npluanuj yuav tsi muaj qaabhau rua nub kws koj tuag, tabsis kev ncaaj nceeg yuav cawm tau koj txujsa.
Txujkev ncaaj nceeg ua rua tug tuabneeg sab zoo ua lub neej kaaj sab, tabsis tug tuabneeg sab phem tej kev phem yuav ua rua nwg raug kev puamtsuaj.
Txujkev ncaaj nceeg paab tau tug tuabneeg sab ncaaj dlim, tabsis tug tuabneeg sab nkhaus yuav maag lub vuj hlua kws yog nwg txujkev phem.
Thaus tug tuabneeg sab phem tuag, nwg txujkev ca sab taag nrug nwg. Txhua yaam kws nwg ca sab rua yuav tsi muaj qaabhau dlaabtsi.
Cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg tau txais kev cawm dlim, cov tuabneeg sab phem yuav raug kev puamtsuaj.
Tug tuabneeg tsi fwm Vaajtswv tej lug ua rua koj raug kev puamtsuaj, tabsis txujkev txawj ntse ntawm tug tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg paab tau koj dlim.
Tej tuabneeg huv lub nroog zoo sab thaus cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg tau koob moov, hab puab qw zoo sab thaus cov tuabneeg sab phem tuag.
Thaus cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg foom koob moov; lub nroog muaj kev vaammeej; tabsis cov tuabneeg sab phem tej lug ua rua lub nroog raug kev puamtsuaj.
Tug tuabneeg ruag nyam has lug thuam lwm tug. Yog koj ntse, koj tsi xob ua tuabneeg ntau ncauj.
Tsi muaj leejtwg ca sab rua tug tuabneeg ntau ncauj, tabsis koj yeej tso sab tau rua tug kws koj ntseeg sab.
Lub tebchaws yuav poob moog yog tsi muaj tug coj. Tabsis yog muaj coob tug tuavxaam yuav ua rua muaj kev tswjfwm ruaj khov.
Yog koj tau coglug nrug lwm tug them nuj nqes, koj yuav tau ris cov nqe ntawd. Zoo dlua koj ca le muab tso tseg tsi xob koom teg nrug nwg.

Tug quaspuj kws muaj lub sab zoo mas luas yeej fwm nwg, tabsis tug quaspuj kws sab tsi ncaaj yuav poob ntsejmuag. Tug tuabneeg tubnkeeg yeej tsi nrug luas muaj nyaj ib zag le,  tabsis tug tuabneeg nquag yuav muaj txag npluanuj.
Thaus koj ua sab dlawb sab zoo, yog koj ua zoo rua koj ntaag. Tabsis yog koj ua lub sab nruj tsiv, tej ntawd yuav rov lug raug koj xwb.
Tug tuabneeg sab phem tsi tau tej nqe zug zoo le, tabsis yog koj ua kev ncaaj nceeg, koj yuav tau tej nqe zug kws zoo.
Tug kws ua lub neej nyob ruaj nreeg rua txujkev ncaaj nceeg yuav muaj txujsa nyob, tabsis tug kws pheej nrhav nrhw txujkev phem yuav tuag moog.
Tug TSWV ntxub cov tuabneeg kws muaj lub sab limham, tabsis nwg hlub cov tuabneeg kws coj ncaaj nceeg.
Koj yuavtsum paub has tas cov tuabneeg ua phem ua qas yuav raug txim, tabsis cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg yuav tsiv dlim.
Tug quaspuj zoo nkauj kws tsi muaj tswvyim, zoo le lub khawb kub kws muab dlai rua ntawm npua taubntswg ntaag.
Tej kws cov tuabneeg zoo xaav yuav, yeej ibtxwm xaus rua yaam zoo, thaus cov tuabneeg sab phem tau yaam kws puab ntshaw, tsuas yog kev npautawg.
Muaj qee leej siv puab tej nyaj txag lawm laub lug, puab tseem muaj txag npluanuj. Tabsis muaj ibtxha mas cuamkhum kawg los puab pluag kawg le.
Ua tuabneeg sab dlawb sab zoo, koj lub neej txhaj yuav vaammeej. Paab lwm tug, luas txhaj yuav paab koj.

Tug tuabneeg pluag yeej tsi muaj leejtwg nyam, txawm yog tej tuabneeg zej zog los yeej tsi nyam nwg; tabsis tug npluanuj muaj phoojywg coob.
